summary: Successfully completed Phase 4 Week 8 Days 1-2: GitHub API Foundation with secure authentication and rate limiting
achievements: Implemented secure PAT storage using DPAPI encryption
Implemented exponential backoff with jitter for API retry logic
Created rate limit monitoring and warning system
Developed comprehensive test suite for validation
critical_learnings: PowerShellForGitHub requires explicit configuration after PAT storage
Retry-After header must be respected for 429 responses
Jitter prevents thundering herd in retry scenarios
SecureString disposal critical for memory security
next_steps: Phase 4 Week 8 Days 3-4: Issue Management System - Create GitHub issue creation automation and deduplication logic
